[![](https://envision2025.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/40/2022/07/Q12022env2025.png)](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1G8G8QtUC_zQ17BnT7PC2WMjLK5qnvlNaeANIWjdQ1RA) #### [Download Here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1G8G8QtUC_zQ17BnT7PC2WMjLK5qnvlNaeANIWjdQ1RA) What is UTM enVision 2025 ? UTM enVision 2025 is a document that set the direction of what UTM aspire to be in 2025. It also set 8 priorities in achieving the targets. It focusses on harnessing talents through creative and resilience performance delivery to attain institutional growth while giving transformative life experiences to the students and staff. Tan Sri Abdul Halim bin Ali Former Chairman, Board of Directors, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia enVision 2025 marks UTM’s bold strategies and forward-looking action plans by capitalizing on current technology and agile talents as we move forward in prospering lives. Prof. Datuk Ir. Dr. Wahid bin Omar Former Vice Chancellor, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia enVision 2025 entails the strategic roadmap of the university in emphasizing the positive approach to empower and inspire UTM community to strive and thrive amidst the current and future challenges. It focuses on enculturating great sense of well being driven by UTM core values. Prof. Datuk Ts Dr Ahmad Fauzi Ismail Vice Chancellor, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia enVision 2025 presents the framework to guide our journey in the next five years. Guided by our core values, we have set 5 strategic thrust that corresponded  to 8 strategic priorities, 15 key performance indicator and realistic targets. Action plans are also documented in the hope that the targets will be achieved.
